pr_title: Added an effect to stop the server

timeline.message: Switched to an enum and added skript doc annotations

timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText: Theres no pattern for reload. As discussed earlier I dont think it should be added, but regardless either add a pattern or remove the method in the execute.
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText: this should have variations for stop/restart
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText: What do you mean by "If restarting isn't configured, the server will stop."?
timeline.author: Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText: what about 'if the restart-script spigot.yml option isn't set up the server will stop.'
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: Just this and then I think we can merge.
replies.author: Wealthyturtle

timeline.author: Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText: Actually, scratch that. Since there's only stop or restart, you should use boolean, and replace the switch-case block in execute()
replies.author: Wealthyturtle

timeline.message: switched from an int to the boolean

timeline.bodyText: Uh... isn't it just (restart ? "restart" : "stop") + " the server";
timeline.author: Wealthyturtle

timeline.bodyText: IMO you should put each pattern on it's own line 🙂
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: Maybe put restart server on it's own line? They are pretty short though.
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.message: Merge branch 'EffStopServer' of https://github.com/DeltaRays/Skript into EffStopServer
